alert.note: Alert for Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 1:18PM PDT until August 15 at 2:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Nye County in south central Nevada... * Until 215 PM PDT. * At 117 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northeast of Beatty, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. * Locations impacted include... Beatty and Lathrop Wells. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
